review: I love the idea of having an easy way to stream Amazon Prime to my TV but when I first installed the Firestick I had streaming issues in Hulu only. I was advised to uninstall and re install Hulu. That worked a little better but I have since cancelled Hulu because I had Netflix. Then I started having streaming problems in Netflix so I reinstalled Netflix but this only helped minimally. I'm going to switch back to the Chromecast that I have on another TV.

review: Needs a lot of work. My feeling is that the hardware is pretty solid, but the software is not very good. Amazon video services work pretty well, but I continuously get video playback errors with the Hulu and Netflix apps. My PS3 and Roku Streaming Stick work fine even when the Fire TV Stick (FTS) isn't, which tells me that the FTS is the issue. The FTS seems a little less responsive than you would like. It feels like it isn't very good at freeing up memory when you leave apps. I would pass on this device for now.
